remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 以下代码The following code 示例创建一个 ，将 委托添加到 和 事件，并通过属性将添加 到 控件的 。example creates a , adds a delegate to both the and events, and adds the to the of a control through the property. `DecimalToCurrency`添加到事件中的事件委托 使用方法将绑定值（ 类型）格式化为货币 。The `DecimalToCurrency` event delegate, added to the event, formats the bound value (a type) as currency using the method. `CurrencyToDecimal`添加到事件中的事件委托 将控件显示的值转换回 类型。The `CurrencyToDecimal` event delegate, added to the event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the type.
